blocks.name: halfcl
blocks.content: Closure of half of a number. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2006.)

blocks.name: rehalfcl
blocks.content: Real closure of half. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2006.)

blocks.name: half0
blocks.content: Half of a number is zero iff the number is zero. (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-2006.)

blocks.name: 2halves
blocks.content: Two halves make a whole. (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2halves(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), c0))
} = {
  3eqtr3rd(co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(co(c0, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2, co(c0, caddc, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  2times(c0)
  mp3an23(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2), c0), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2cn()
  2ne0()
  divcan3(c0, nat2)
  anidms(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  2cnne0()
  divdir(c0, c0, nat2)
}

blocks.name: halfpos2
blocks.content: A number is positive iff its half is positive. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2005.)

blocks.name: halfpos
blocks.content: A positive number is greater than its half. (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: halfnneg2
blocks.content: A number is nonnegative iff its half is nonnegative. (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2005.)

blocks.name: halfaddsubcl
blocks.content: Closure of half-sum and half-difference. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 12-Oct-2007.)

blocks.name: halfaddsub
blocks.content: Sum and difference of half-sum and half-difference. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 12-Oct-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm halfaddsub(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2)), c0), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2)), c1)))
} = {
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2)), c0), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2)), c1))
  3eqtr3d(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2)), c0, co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, nat2), co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, nat2, co(nat2, cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  eqtr4d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(nat2, cmul, c0), co(c0, caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  3anidm13(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(c0, caddc, c0)))
  ppncan(c0, c1, c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, c0), co(c0, caddc, c0)))
  2times(c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc))
  mp3an3(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2))), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  divdir(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmin, c1), nat2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2), c0))
  mp3an23(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2), c0), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  divcan3(c0, nat2)
  3eqtr3d(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2)), c1, co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, nat2), co(co(nat2, cmul, c1), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, nat2, co(nat2, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  eqtr4d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(c1, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  3anidm23(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(c1, caddc, c1)))
  pnncan(c0, c1, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(c1, caddc, c1)))
  2times(c1)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc))
  addcl(c0, c1)
  subcl(c0, c1)
  mp3an3(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, nat2))), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  2cnne0()
  divsubdir(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmin, c1), nat2)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c1), cdiv, nat2), c1))
  mp3an23(wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c1), cdiv, nat2), c1), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2cn()
  2ne0()
  divcan3(c1, nat2)
}

blocks.name: subhalfhalf
blocks.content: Subtracting the half of a number from the number yields the half of the number. (Contributed by AV, 28-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm subhalfhalf(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq1d(c0, cmin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  eqcomd(c0, co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  divcan1d(c0, nat2, wcel(c0, cc))
  id(wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c0, cc))
  mulcomd(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), nat2, wcel(c0, cc))
  3eqtrd(co(co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(nat1, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c0, cc))
  mulsubfacd(nat2, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), nat1, wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), nat1))
  2m1e1()
  mulid2d(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  halfcl(c0)
}

blocks.name: lt2halves
blocks.content: A sum is less than the whole if each term is less than half. (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm lt2halves(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c2, cdiv, nat2))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2)))
} = {
  sylibd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c2, cdiv, nat2))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, nat2))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c2, cdiv, nat2))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), cr)))
  3simpa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), cr)))
  jca(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), cr))
  rehalfcl(c2)
  lt2add(c0, c1, co(c2, cdiv, nat2), co(c2, cdiv, nat2))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, nat2))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2)))
  breq2d(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)), c2, wcel(c2, cr))
  syl(wcel(c2, cr), wceq(co(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)), c2), wcel(c2, cc))
  recn(c2)
  2halves(c2)
}

blocks.name: addltmul
blocks.content: Sum is less than product for numbers greater than 2. (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 24-Sep-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm addltmul(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
} = {
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  bi2anan9(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat2, clt, c1), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  mp3an13(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(nat2, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  ltsub1(nat2, c0, nat1)
  breq1i(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat1)
  syl6bb(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat2, clt, c1), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  mp3an13(wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(nat2, clt, c1), wbr(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(nat2, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  2re()
  ltsub1(nat2, c1, nat1)
  breq1i(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1), nat1)
  2m1e1()
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wi(wa(wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cr))
  peano2rem(c0)
  peano2rem(c1)
  ex(wa(wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cr)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  mulgt1(co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  3bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1)))
  breq2d(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  mpanr2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  mpanl2(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  mulsub(c0, nat1, c1, nat1)
  syl5rbbr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1))))
  breq2i(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1))
  oveq2i(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1), nat1)
  1t1e1()
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1))))), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cr))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cmul, nat1), cr))
  remulcli(nat1, nat1)
  readdcl(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(nat1, cmul, nat1))
  mp3an2(wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cr), wb(wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1))))), wcel(nat1, cr))
  ltaddsub2(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), nat1, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)))
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmul, nat1), cr))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  remulcl(c0, nat1)
  mpan2(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c1, cmul, nat1), cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  remulcl(c1, nat1)
  readdcl(co(c0, cmul, nat1), co(c1, cmul, nat1))
  remulcl(c0, c1)
  mp3an3(wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wb(wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1))), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  ltadd1(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), co(c0, cmul, c1), nat1)
  breq1d(co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)), clt, co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveqan12d(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1), c0, c1, wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  ax-1rid(c0)
  ax-1rid(c1)
}

blocks.name: nominpos
blocks.content: There is no smallest positive real number. (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm nominpos(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wn(wrex(s0, cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wn(wrex(s1, cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  nrex(s0, cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wn(wrex(s1, cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wn(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wn(wrex(s1, cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))))), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))))
  syl6an(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cr), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), clt, cv(s0))))
  rehalfcl(cv(s0))
  jcad(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), clt, cv(s0)))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))
  mpanr12(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0))), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2re()
  2pos()
  divgt0(cv(s0), nat2)
  biimpd(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), clt, cv(s0)))
  halfpos(cv(s0))
  rspcev(s1, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), clt, cv(s0))), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), clt, cv(s0)))
  breq2(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), nat0, clt)
  breq1(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), clt, cv(s0))
  iman(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cr, wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wbr(nat0, clt, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), clt, cv(s0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, nat0, clt, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), clt, cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: avglt1
blocks.content: Ordering property for average. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm avglt1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2))))
} = {
  3bitr2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c0), clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmul, nat2), clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  3anidm13(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c0), clt, co(c0, caddc, c1))))
  ltadd2(c0, c1, c0)
  breq1d(co(c0, cmul, nat2), clt, co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, nat2), co(c0, caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  recnd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  times2(c0)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(co(c0, cmul, nat2), clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wa(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2re()
  2pos()
  ltmuldiv(c0, co(c0, caddc, c1), nat2)
}

blocks.name: avglt2
blocks.content: Ordering property for average. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm avglt2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr4rd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(nat2, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c1, caddc, c1)))
  breq2d(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(c1, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(c1, caddc, c1)), wcel(c1, cc))
  recnd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  2times(c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(nat2, cmul, c1))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2re()
  2pos()
  ltdivmul(co(c0, caddc, c1), c1, nat2)
  3anidm23(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c1, caddc, c1))))
  ltadd1(c0, c1, c1)
}

blocks.name: avgle1
blocks.content: Ordering property for average. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm avgle1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wn(wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c0)))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c0))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c0), wbr(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), clt, c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), clt, c0)))
  avglt2(c1, c0)
  breq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c0, co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2, co(c1, caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  addcom(c0, c1)
  lenlt(c0, c1)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c0, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2)), wn(wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c0))), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cr))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  rehalfcl(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  lenlt(c0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2))
}

blocks.name: avgle2
blocks.content: Ordering property for average. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm avgle2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2))))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2)))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(c1, clt, co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2))))
  avglt1(c1, c0)
  breq2d(c1, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2, co(c1, caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  addcom(c0, c1)
  lenlt(c0, c1)
  sylancom(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2)))), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cr))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  rehalfcl(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  lenlt(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), c1)
}

blocks.name: avgle
blocks.content: The average of two numbers is less than or equal to at least one of them. (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm avgle(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c0), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c1)))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c0), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c1)), wo(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  orcomd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  letric(c0, c1)
  orbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c0), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c1))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c0), wbr(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), cle, c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), cle, c0)))
  avgle2(c1, c0)
  breq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cle, c0, co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2, co(c1, caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  addcom(c0, c1)
  avgle2(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: 2timesd
blocks.content: Two times a number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: times2d
blocks.content: A number times 2. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: halfcld
blocks.content: Closure of half of a number (frequently used special case). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: 2halvesd
blocks.content: Two halves make a whole. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: rehalfcld
blocks.content: Real closure of half. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: lt2halvesd
blocks.content: A sum is less than the whole if each term is less than half. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: rehalfcli
blocks.content: Half a real number is real. Inference form. (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)

blocks.name: lt2addmuld
blocks.content: If two real numbers are less than a third real number, the sum of the two real numbers is less than twice the third real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: add1p1
blocks.content: Adding two times 1 to a number. (Contributed by AV, 22-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: sub1m1
blocks.content: Subtracting two times 1 from a number. (Contributed by AV, 23-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: cnm2m1cnm3
blocks.content: Subtracting 2 and afterwards 1 from a number results in the difference between the number and 3. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 16-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: xp1d2m1eqxm1d2
blocks.content: A complex number increased by 1, then divided by 2, then decreased by 1 equals the complex number decreased by 1 and then divided by 2. (Contributed by AV, 24-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm xp1d2m1eqxm1d2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, nat1), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
} = {
  mulcan2ad(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, nat1), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), nat2, wcel(c0, cc))
  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cc))
  peano2cnm(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2))
  halfcld(co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  3eqtrd(co(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmin, nat1), cmul, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), co(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), cmin, co(nat1, cmul, nat2)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  subdird(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), nat1, nat2, wcel(c0, cc))
  halfcld(co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq12d(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), cmin, co(nat1, cmul, nat2), co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat2, wcel(c0, cc))
  divcan1d(co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat2, wcel(c0, cc))
  peano2cn(c0)
  mulid2d(nat2, wcel(c0, cc))
  3eqtr2rd(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c0, cmin, co(nat2, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  divcan1d(co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat2, wcel(c0, cc))
  peano2cnm(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  oveq2d(c0, cmin, co(nat2, cmin, nat1), nat1, wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(nat2, cmin, nat1), nat1))
  2m1e1()
  subsub3d(c0, nat2, nat1, wcel(c0, cc))
  id(wcel(c0, cc))
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cc))
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cc))
}

blocks.name: div4p1lem1div2
blocks.content: An integer greater than 5, divided by 4 and increased by 1, is less than or equal to the half of the integer minus 1. (Contributed by AV, 8-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm div4p1lem1div2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat6, cle, c0)), wbr(co(co(c0, cdiv, nat4), caddc, nat1), cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
} = {
